channel.title: Global Message When Someone Votes Help?

item.title: Global Message When Someone Votes Help?
item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

This is my code currently

case 0: player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for a Abyssal Whip!</col>"); break; case 1: player.getInventory().addItem(24155, 1); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for a Double Spin Ticket!</col>"); break; case 2: player.getInventory().addItem(18831, 100); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for a x100 Frost Dragon Bones!</col>"); break; case 3: player.getInventory().addItem(23531, 5); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for a x5 Overloads!</col>"); break; case 4: player.getInventory().addItem(4278, 1); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for a Vote Token!</col>"); break; case 5: player.getInventory().addItem(995, 10000000); players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=5><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + " just voted for 10m!</col>");

All this code is in the Commands.java and when I compile I get a error with the code, Iâ€™m not really sure where I am going wrong here?

Read full topic
